verbs.description: Jared Kushner [V: has] received his full government security clearance after more than a year of delay and controversy , removing a hurdle to his continued service as a key advisor to President Trump , his father - in - law .

[ARG0: Jared Kushner] has [V: received] [ARG1: his full government security clearance] [ARGM-TMP: after more than a year of delay and controversy] , [ARGM-ADV: removing a hurdle to his continued service as a key advisor to President Trump , his father - in - law] .

[ARG0: Jared Kushner] has received his full government security clearance after more than a year of delay and controversy , [V: removing] [ARG1: a hurdle] [ARG2: to his continued service as a key advisor to President Trump , his father - in - law] .
